section.name: Scheduled publication
section.span: What about scheduling the online publication of documents?
section.p: Scheduled publication is a feature of Hippo CMS involving scheduling the online publication of documents.
If an editor wants to publish a document online, or take a published document offline, he or she will be asked when this action has to be taken by the system.

The feature of scheduled publication gives more freedom to the editor than unscheduled publication, which entails that publication actions can only occur immediately after the editor set the appropiate marks.
